examples: I arrived at the airport two hours before my flight.
She works at the airport as a flight attendant.
The airport was closed due to bad weather.
Cheguei ao aeroporto duas horas antes do meu voo.
Ela trabalha no aeroporto como comissária de bordo.
O aeroporto foi fechado devido ao mau tempo.

suggested: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing at the airport!
The thought of long-distance goodbyes at the airport can be bittersweet.
Why do airport security lines have to be so long and frustrating? It's such a hassle!
Did you know that Singapore's Changi Airport has a rooftop swimming pool for travelers to relax and unwind?
The distinct smell of jet fuel and the sound of planes taking off and landing.
The feeling of excitement when boarding a plane for a new adventure.
Airports can bring people from all over the world together, allowing for connections and cultural exchanges.
